altername_name: Cookin' Idol I! My! Mine!: Game de Hirameki! Kirameki! Cooking
name: Cookin' Idol I! My! Main! Game de Hirameki! Kirameki Cooking
overview: Cookin' Idol I! My! Main! Game de Hirameki! Kirameki Cooking is a Simulation game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2010.
